name: Manith Luthria
summary: Results-driven software engineer with a Master's in Electrical and Computer Engineering from Duke University. Skilled in building scalable, production-ready web and backend systems in fast-paced environments using React, Python, Java, JavaScript, and SQL. Demonstrates strong engineering aptitude through automation, data-driven app development, and rapid iteration. Experienced in cross-functional collaboration and optimizing systems for efficiency using modern software engineering practices.

experience.title: Full Stack Software Engineer
achievements: Developed 5+ internal web apps using React and SQL, streamlining real-time decision workflows for global manufacturing teams.
Redesigned frontend architecture of an equipment dashboard used at 100+ sites globally, boosting UI responsiveness by 50%.
Created full-stack tools that automated manual fab operations, saving ~2 hours per day for production teams.
Coordinated with 10+ stakeholders to deliver high-impact, data-driven solutions in a dynamic engineering environment.
Enhanced legacy fab automation tools with modern UI improvements, reducing support tickets by 50% and increasing user satisfaction.
Engineered visualization tools to deliver critical fab insights for faster, data-based decision making on the manufacturing floor.

experience.title: Software Engineer Intern
achievements: Added copy-paste capabilities to PM web app using React and JavaScript, improving technician efficiency and saving over 2 hours daily.
Implemented backend Java API logic to optimize safe data ingestion and prevent Oracle SQL overflows.
Developed reporting dashboards for fab applications, reducing report generation time by 50% and improving data accessibility.
Gained hands-on expertise in a 300mm semiconductor fab, collaborating across engineering disciplines to improve manufacturing outcomes.

projects.name: Modurnal
projects.subtitle: Journaling App with AI Mood Insights & Spotify Integration
details: Built journaling app using React Native and TypeScript with a focus on smooth UI and high performance.
Integrated AI-powered sentiment analysis via OpenAI API, delivering actionable mood insights for users.
Developed Spotify integration feature to analyze correlations between music habits and journal activity.
Designed and secured cloud backend with Supabase and PostgreSQL, leveraging Row-Level Security for robust authentication and efficient data pipelines.

education.degree: Masters of Engineering in Electrical and Computer Engineering
Bachelors of Science (x2)- Electrical and Computer Engineering + Computer Science
